Angder.name: Angder
description: Angder is chaotic, violent, and has a love of combat. His cards involve <c=boldPink>absurd numbers of attacks</c> and he often goes <c=boldPink>missing</c> for extended periods.

PersonalJetpack.name: Personal Jetpack
PersonalJetpack.description: If you have no Fury, planned Heist, or Rampage, "Angder is missing" will reduce by 1 each turn .

BurntoutFireRegulator.name: Burnt out Firing Regulator
BurntoutFireRegulator.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>energy</c> every other turn, Removes reliable from all cleave attacks. <c=downside>All cleave attacks have a base damage of 0. </c>

ChainAxe.name: Chainsaw Axe
ChainAxe.description: For every 3 cards played in one turn that are not from Angder or his lootstash, gain 1 rampage.

Biggerbullets.name: Bigger Shells
Biggerbullets.description: Destroying Midrow objects deals 2 damage to the enemy ship. UNUSED

HairTrigger.name: HairTrigger
HairTrigger.description: At the start of each combat, add at least one <c=card>"Slight nudge"</c> card to your discard pile. <c=boldPink>the number of cards generated scales with a larger deck, capping at 4 with 25 cards</c>. <c=downside>Not recommended for drone users.</c>

ShipsManifest.name: Ships Manifest
ShipsManifest.description: At the start of each combat, you gain 3 planned heists, in addition, when triggered planned heist grants an extra card.

description.None: On draw, immediately Shoot for <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> then draw a card.
description.A: On draw, immediately Shoot for <c=boldPink>{{damage2}}</c> then draw a card.
description.B: On draw, immediately shoot for <c=boldPink>{{damage3}}</c> then draw two cards.

description.None: When drawn, cleave dealing <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> damage per shot. Reliable.
description.A: Cleave dealing <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> damage per shot. Draw 1. Immediate. Reliable.
description.B: Long Cleave twice for <c=boldPink>{{damage}}</c> damage per shot. Immediate. Reliable.

description.None: Select a card in hand, it gains Remote control.
description.A: Select two cards in hand, they gain Remote control.
description.B: Every card in your hand gains Remote control.

description.None: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.
description.A: Deal piercing damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as pierce damage.
description.B: Deal damage = to hull. Then take enemy hull as damage.

Remotecontrol.name: Remote Control
Remotecontrol.description: Card can be used while it's owner is missing.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: If Angder is missing, deals <c=boldPink>{0}</c> damage to the enemy at the start of each turn. Drops by 2 each turn while Angder is missing.

Theft.name: Planned heist
Theft.description: If Angder is missing at the start of your turn, add a 0 cost card into your hand from Angder's haul. Ticks down when activated.

description.Right: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Right
description.Left: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further to the Left
description.Unknown: Fire <c=boldPink>{{Long}}</c> shots, dealing <c=boldPink>{{truedamage}}</c> damage each. Each shot drifts further in a random, but consistant, direction.

description.Damage: Ram into the enemy ship, dealing damage equal to your current hull. <c=downside>You then take damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c>
description.Piercing: Ram into the enemy ship, bypassing their shields, and dealing piercing damage equal to your current hull. <c=downside>You then take piercing damage equal to their remaining Hull value.</c>

description.Damage: This action deals a set amount of damage per shot, it cannot be modified by status effects or artifacts.
